name: Disrespectfully Speaking
description:
2009 release. At one time, Shyheim was the youngest Wu-Tang affiliate and was nicknamed The Rugged Child. Now he's all grown up and so his is style. Disrespectfully Speaking is Shyheim's first official release in nearly five years and on it he brings the emotion, lyrical skill, and gritty East Coast sound he's been known for since he was 14. The only difference is now he's lived a lot more of life and his subject matter is a lot more diverse because of that. With Disrespectfully Speaking, Shyheim shows why people have been talking about his skills for over half his life.

name: MANCHILD  - SHYHEIM
description: Shyheim the youngest member of the Wu-tang family has once again hit us wit a dope cd. This cd matches "The lost generation" and the beats are like "Ghostface killah's "supreme clientele". I would have give this cd 5 stars wit a couple of more track on the album. the best tracks on the album are "Furious Anger", "Manchild" and "Trust it's on". Mc's Featuring on the cd are Big L, R.I.P, the PR Terrorist Dom Pacchino from Killarmy and Method Man. If you are into Wu-tang then you must have this in your Cd collection. 1 Intro 2 I Declare War 3 Furious Anger 4 Unconditional Love 5 Crime Story 6 Verses From The Arsenal 7 One Life To Live 8 Manchild 9 Am I My Brothers Keeper 10 Obscene 11 Spectacular 12 Twin Glocks 13 Trust It's On 14 Cease Fire

name: Shyheim - The Bottom Of New York (Hosted By Dj Whiteowl)
description:
Shyheim along with his label Bottom Up Records  link up with DJ WhiteOwl for an exclusive mixtape.
(Hard Copy)

This mixtape will be autographed.
